messages.content: Thank you for calling Google customer service. My name is Emil. May I know your name, please?
Hi Emil, my name is Chloe.
Hi Chloe, nice to meet you! How can I assist you today?
I have some questions about Google Search. Can you help me with that?
Of course, Chloe! What specific questions do you have about Google Search?
I'm curious about some tips on how to use Google Search more effectively. Any advice?
That's really helpful! I didn't know about the quotation marks. I'd also like to know if there are any shortcuts or tricks for finding specific types of information, like recent news or images.

Yes, definitely! You can use Google Search's specific tabs like News, Images, or Videos to find specific types of content. Moreover, you can use filters by clicking on 'Tools' beneath the search bar. This allows you to filter results by time, such as the past hour, past 24 hours, or past week. Itâ€™s super handy for finding recent information. Anything else?
Wow, I didn't know about those filters! This is great info. What about using special operators to exclude words or find results from a specific site?
This is awesome, Emil! Thanks so much for all your help. I'll definitely be using these tips to make my searches better.
messages.chocolate -recipe\\ if you want to searc: site:example.com\ followed by your search term. For example, typing \

messages.content: You're very welcome, Chloe! I'm glad I could help. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
